member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Profiling.Status
member.summary: The possible outcomes of a validation fragment

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Profiling.Group
member.summary: The groups under which all validation results are grouped

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Profiling.SpecificationBinder.Bind(Hl7.Fhir.Profiling.Specification)
member.summary: Make the profile complete and usable by binding all internal structures and perform precompilation

member.name: T:Hl7.Fhir.Profiling.Specification
member.summary: FHIR Profile. Basis for validation of FHIR Resources. Profile should be constructed from a ProfileBuilder

member.name: M:Hl7.Fhir.Profiling.Specification.FollowPath(Hl7.Fhir.Profiling.Element,Hl7.Fhir.Profiling.Path)
member.summary: Follows the path into child elements and into other structures. The latter hasn't been tested yet
member.param: The element where the follow starts
member.returns: The element (if found) at the end of the path, otherwise returns null
